<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mesmerizing Opal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=225)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Deception check to Feint, but you haven't rolled yet

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silver-bound opal pendant is afire with iridescence. When you activate it, if the outcome of your triggering Deception check is a critical failure, you get a failure instead (or if the outcome is a success, you get a critical success instead).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mesmerizing Opal
